name: WaveFlex
description:
Can you collect all the stars? Let's check it out.

How to play: Drag your mouse to change wave's shape.

CREDITS:Casaptiuc Elena, Tatiana Baicev, Cernei Eugeniu, Timoftii Victor, Mihai Coscodan, Rusu Dumitru.

Bug report: victortimoftii@yahoo.com

- No downloaded assets, all assets were raw-made by people mentioned in CREDITS.
